title: Bake Off romance: Are Henry and Alice from GBBO dating?
text:
Have Bake Off stars Alice and Henry have found love in the tent? (Picture: Alice Fevronia; Channel 4)

The Great British Bake Off has served up plenty of drama this year already, from a shock double dumping to tears in the tent and, if rumours were to be believed, the very first Bake Off romance.

GBBO contestants Henry Bird and Alice Fevronia sparked romance rumours after the series started that they had started dating after they were seen leaving sweet comments on each other’s Instagram photos and then Alice shared snaps of the pair spending time together away from the Channel 4 cameras.

Fans couldn’t contain their joy at the thought of a rising romance between two Bake Off stars outside of the tent, but are the contestants actually dating, or just good friends after bonding on the stressful show?

Are Henry and Alice from Bake Off dating?

Despite The Sun reporting that an insider told them that Henry and Alice were: ‘a lovely couple and seem very happy’ and Alice’s pictures of the pair out and about in London on social media, it seems that the claims that they are a couple aren’t true.

Advertisement

Advertisement

After reports about their rumoured romance were published, Alice took to Instagram to share a picture of her hanging out with Henry, Michael and David.

She captioned the image: ‘But how many couples can you see…?’ along with a picture of a face palm emoji.

Her fans and followers were quick to pick up on the hint with one pointing out: ‘OMG is this a response to THAT 👀 article??? I love it 😂’ with another laughing along with Alice and saying, ‘the dating thing is hilarious.’

In addition to Alice’s cryptic response, Digital Spy reports that they have learned the rumours that Henry and Alice are dating are categorically untrue.

Sorry to deflate your mille-feuilles, Bake Off fans, but it seems we’ll have to wait until at least next season for a potential GBBO romance.

The Great British Bake Off airs tonight on Channel 4 at 8pm.

MORE: Great British Bake Off 2019: Priya O’Shea’s family ‘concerned’ for baker’s stress levels

MORE: With such dull challenges, it’s no surprise the Bake Off contestants have hit a wall
description: Great British Bake Off has already served up drama this year but has it also got its very first Bake Off romance between Henry and Alice?
